content: this is a crochet pattern for a no-sew zipper pouch use this bag to store your crochet notions coins pens tiny toys etc no need to add a zipper to this pouch simply super glue a premade canvas zipper pouch inside the crochet piece easy peasy video tutorial included **materials** yarn worsted weight yarn in 3 colors 15 yards of each color hook g / 4 0mm yarn needle scissors fabric hot glue & gun 6 5 x 4 5 canvas zipper pouch or 6 5 zipper
